questions.question: Which property is used to change the background color?
options: color
background-color
bgcolor
background
questions.correct: background-color

questions.question: Which unit is relative to the font-size of the element?
options: em
px
rem
questions.correct: em

questions.question: Which property controls the text size?
options: font-style
text-size
font-size
size
questions.correct: font-size

questions.question: What does CSS stand for?
options: Cascading Style Sheets
Colorful Style Sheets
Computer Style Sheets
Creative Style Sheets
questions.correct: Cascading Style Sheets

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to change text color?
options: color
text-color
font-color
foreground-color
questions.correct: color

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to set the font of a text?
options: font-family
text-style
font-weight
font
questions.correct: font-family

questions.question: How do you make text bold in CSS?
options: font-style: bold;
font-weight: bold;
text-bold: yes;
font-thickness: bold;
questions.correct: font-weight: bold;

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to add space inside an element, between the content and the border?
options: margin
padding
spacing
border-width
questions.correct: padding

questions.question: Which property is used to align text to the center of an element?
options: align
text-align
center-text
text-position
questions.correct: text-align

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to control the space outside an element?
options: padding
margin
border
spacing
questions.correct: margin

questions.question: What is the default value of the CSS 'display' property?
options: block
inline
none
flex
questions.correct: block

questions.question: Which property is used to add an underline to text?

text-style: underline;

underline: yes;
questions.correct: text-decoration: underline;
